title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Fundamentals of Phytoplankton Community Analysis Using Satellite Remote Sensing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Oceanography and Optical Measurement Principles, Along with Fundamental Statistical Analysis Skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can interpret satellite remote sensing data to explain phytoplankton community distribution patterns.
Learners can understand the measurement principles of hyperspectral sensors (EMIT/PACE) and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can estimate phytoplankton absorption coefficients (a_phy) and chlorophyll-a (Chl-a) concentrations using variational autoencoder (VAE)-based algorithms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
